attributes.action: We want a childrens fund in place to pay for potentially life saving treatment not available in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a sad fact of life that if your child has an illness where treatment is not available in the UK but is available in another country The parents of that child have to raise the funds often running into 100s of Thousands of pounds to potentially save their childs life.Our Country is letting these children die because of lack of funding.A new tax wherby 1.00 gbp is taken from every adults salary or benefit every week would give our children a chance of life
